source.author: Laura Meckler, Nick Anderson
source.title: In Connecticut, Miguel Cardona led a full-court press for schools to reopen

exampleSentences.sentence: She said there are schools with windows that won’t open, without soap in the restrooms and where ventilation systems are out of date.

source.author: Sara Kiley Watson
source.title: What we can learn from Scotland’s free period products

exampleSentences.sentence: People also need access to things like clean water, soap, and fresh underwear to confidently get through their day-to-day life while on their period.

source.author: jakemeth
source.title: Why business must help end ‘period poverty’ for women in America

exampleSentences.sentence: Businesses provide soap, paper towels, water, and toilet paper to customers and employees who use their restrooms without charge—and without second thought.

source.author: Voice of San Diego
source.title: Morning Report: Why COVID Is Coursing Through Local Jails

exampleSentences.sentence: Plus, it’s harder to obtain basic necessities like soap or masks and on-site testing is still hard to come by.

source.author: Maya Srikrishnan
source.title: San Diego’s Many Jail Outbreaks Have These Factors in Common

exampleSentences.sentence: Experts have also heard reports about difficulties accessing things like masks or soap in various facilities, or that sometimes staff members don’t always use masks while interacting with those detained.

source.author: Laura Daily
source.title: Gifts that keep on giving: These retailers offer one-for-one deals or make financial donations

exampleSentences.sentence: For every Soapbox product you purchase, the company donates a bar of soap to someone in need through food pantries, clinics and homeless shelters.

source.author: Sandra Gutierrez G.
source.title: The best ways to stop a mask from fogging up your glasses, ranked

exampleSentences.sentence: This works because the soap leaves a film over your glasses that prevents them from fogging up.

source.author: PopSci Staff
source.title: What really happened during the ‘Kentucky meat shower’?

exampleSentences.sentence: The skies were clear, and she was minding her own business and making some soap.

source.author: Kat Eschner
source.title: COVID-19 doesn’t have to jump from mother to newborn

exampleSentences.sentence: Mothers were encouraged to breastfeed and cuddle their babies, but also to wear masks and wash hands and breasts with soap and water before feeding or touching.

source.author: Bethany Brookshire
source.title: Study acid-base chemistry with at-home volcanoes

exampleSentences.sentence: If you add a little dish soap to your acid solution, the bubbles will catch in the soap.
